section.p: We are dedicated to spreading the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ while offering essential support to those in need. Our ministry serves as a beacon of hope, providing a forum for interaction, friendliness, counselling, and training for the community. We are committed to addressing crucial areas such as Fire, Health and Safety Management, and Health Education.

div.p: Share the good news of our Lord Jesus Christ with passion and commitment.
Provide support and resources to those in need, ensuring care and guidance are always available.
Offer counselling and training in areas such as Fire, Health and Safety Management and Health Education, including support for Stroke sufferers.
Empower and engage youth through media programs aimed at discouraging, reducing, and eliminating suicidal thoughts.
Foster an interactive and friendly forum to build a stronger, united community.
